actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the disallowance of deductions for personal interest shall not apply to interest on loans used to buy highway vehicles.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction for personal interest for interest on loans used to buy highway vehicles. Limits such amount to $2,000.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the disallowance of deductions for personal interest shall not apply to interest on loans used to buy highway vehicles.
